alert.note: Alert for Klamath (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:58PM PDT until May 19 at 8:45PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Klamath County in south central Oregon... * Until 845 PM PDT. * At 757 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chemult, or 28 miles northeast of Crater Lake, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Chemult and Walt Haring Snow Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
